price: 75 Nous l’avons admis dans Notre miséricorde. Il était du nombre des vertueux.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
